mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY menu_cd ASC, menu_prnt_cd ASC, menu_ord ASC) AS "key" , menu_cd AS "menu_cd" , menu_nm AS "menu_nm" , site_gb_cd AS "site_gb_cd" , menu_prnt_cd AS "menu_prnt_cd" , menu_tp AS "menu_tp" , CASE menu_tp WHEN 'R' THEN '루트' WHEN 'P' THEN '화면' WHEN 'D' THEN '디렉토리' WHEN 'A' THEN '기능' ELSE NULL END AS "menu_tp_nm" , menu_url AS "menu_url" , menu_ord AS "menu_ord" , TRIM(use_yn) AS "use_yn" , CASE use_yn WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' ELSE NULL END AS "use_yn_nm" , upt_user_id AS "upt_user_id" , TRIM(view_yn) AS "view_yn" , DATE_FORMAT(upt_dttm, '%Y-%m-%m %H:%i:%s') AS "upt_dttm" , view_icon AS "view_icon" FROM tb_menu WHERE site_gb_cd = 'SG0001' AND menu_tp != 'R' ORDER BY menu_cd ASC, menu_prnt_cd ASC, menu_ord ASC
SELECT menu_cd AS "menu_cd", menu_nm AS "menu" FROM tb_menu WHERE site_gb_cd = #{site_gb_cd} AND use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY menu_cd
SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM tb_menu WHERE site_gb_cd=#{site_gb_cd} AND menu_cd LIKE CONCAT(#{menu_cd}, '%%')
